question: Analyze the social media engagement performance of companies across different platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube) to identify trends and insights.

subtasks.task: Retrieve engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares, etc.) from Facebook for all companies.
Retrieve engagement metrics (likes, retweets, and hashtags) from Twitter for all companies.
Retrieve engagement metrics (likes, comments, and views) from Instagram for all companies.
Retrieve engagement metrics (likes, comments, and views) from YouTube for all companies.
Combine and analyze the engagement data from all retrieved social media tables to identify overall trends and platform performance comparisons.
